useCase.name: User Subscribes for Service
useCase.trigger: User requests to subscribe for a service.

mainSequence.step: User sends subscription request to Subscription Controller.
Subscription Controller forwards request to Subscription Service.
Subscription Service processes the subscription request.
Subscription Service interacts with Subscription Repository for data.
Subscription Repository accesses Data Store to store subscription data.
Subscription Repository informs Subscription Service of success.
Subscription Service responds to Subscription Controller.
Subscription Controller sends the response to the User.
User successfully subscribes to the service.
